content.question: At time <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, a cart is at <math alttext="x equals 10 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>10 m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and has a velocity of <math alttext="3 meters per second " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>3 m/s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in the <math alttext="negative x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>-direction. The cart has a constant acceleration in the <math alttext="positive x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-direction with magnitude <math alttext="3 meters per second squared, is less than a, which is less than 6 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>3 m/</mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo><</mo><mi>a</mi><mo><</mo><mn>6</mn><mtext> </mtext><mtext> m/</mtext><mtext></mtext><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> . Which of the following gives the possible range of the position of the cart at <math alttext="t equals 1 second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>1 s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="4 meters, is less than x, which is less than 5.5 meters " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mtext> m</mtext><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>5.5</mn><mtext> m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="8.5 meters, is less than x, which is less than 10 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>8.5</mn><mtext> m</mtext><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext> m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="11.5 meters, is less than x, which is less than 13 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>11.5</mn><mtext> m</mtext><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>13</mn><mtext> </mtext><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="14.5 meters, is less than x, which is less than 16 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>14.5</mn><mtext> m</mtext><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>16</mn><mtext> m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="8.5 meters, is less than x, which is less than 10 meters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>8.5</mn><mtext> m</mtext><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext> m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
